description: NASA’s Chandra X-ray Observatory has detected a massive X-ray jet from quasar J1610+1811, 11.6 billion light-years away. The jet travels at nearly the speed of light, illuminating black hole behavior during the universe’s early era. However, Chandra now faces potential defunding under NASA’s proposed budget. Astronomers warn that cutting Chandra’s mission would cripple high-energy astrophysics, ending a 25-year legacy of breakthroughs. The loss would leave a major gap in our ability to study the most energetic phenomena in the universe. Scientists worldwide are urging to save this essential observatory.
title: NASA Chandra Spots Distant X-Ray Jet; Telescope Faces Major Budget Cuts

description: A new 2025 study published in Global Change Biology shows Earth’s oceans may have entered a dangerous acidification zone in 2020. As CO₂ emissions increase, marine ecosystems are degrading, threatening biodiversity, food security, and coastal economies. Scientists call it a ticking time bomb for the environment and society.
title: Earth’s Oceans Enter Danger Zone Due to Rising Acidification, New Study Warns

description: Pluto's thin haze of organic particles, confirmed by JWST’s mid-infrared observations, plays a crucial role in both cooling its mesosphere and launching methane into space. This methane escapes Pluto’s gravity, landing on Charon’s poles where radiation transforms it into reddish tholins. The study highlights how Pluto’s haze shapes not only its own atmospheric balance but also alters the surface chemistry of its moon. This dynamic exchange between a dwarf planet and its satellite offers rare insight into planetary climate processes across the Solar System.
title: JWST Reveals Pluto’s Haze Cools Atmosphere, Paints Charon’s Poles Red

description: Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 update, released last week, includes a new launch animation for the Gemini overlay. As per a report, it is currently in the split test phase and results in a shrinking animation appearing on the screen to make room for the overlay. Users can reportedly access options such as Share screen with Live and Ask about screen.
title: Android 16 QPR1 Beta 2 Update for Pixel Reportedly Brings New Launch Animation for Gemini Overlay

description: Maryade Prashne is a story of three childhood friends who meet for a birthday party. Here, they face an awakening and tragic incidents that lead them to seek revenge. The incidents not only come across as tragic but totally change their course of life. It leads them on a journey of friendship, loyalty, and justice for their loved ones. The movie features Rakesh Adiga and Sunil Roah along with other star cast. It is directed and written by Nagaraj Somayaji. It is an excellent movie about emotions and revenge, and it is worth watching with family and friends.
title: Maryade Prashne Now Streaming on SunNXT: Everything You Need to Know

description: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra and Galaxy S24 are currently available at a lower price than their launch rates on Amazon. Buyers can take advantage of direct discounts and cashback offers. Additionally, the e-commerce platform also offers trade-in benefits, depending on the model and condition of the old handset.
title: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra, Galaxy S24 Price Lowered on Amazon With Discounts, Cashback Offers

description: The Good Wife is an upcoming Tamil legal drama series starring Priyamani in her OTT debut. Directed by Revathy, the show explores justice, betrayal, and personal strength. Based on the American series of the same name, it will stream exclusively on JioHotstar in Tamil, Hindi, and other regional languages.
title: Good Wife OTT Release: When and Where to Watch Tamil Legal Drama Online?

description: Written and directed by T.R. Bala, Jinn - The Pet is a Tamil language horror-comedy movie that revolves around a family who pets a Jinn, but it soon, end up to a nightmare. The sequences are epic with supernatural and horror events, comedy, and a pinch of romance. Streaming soon on SunNXT.
title: Jinn - The Pet OTT Release Date: When and Where to Where to Watch Tamil Horror-Comedy Online?

description: DD Next Level is a Tamil horror-comedy that has been written and directed by S. Prem Anand. It features Santhanam in the lead role as he portrays the role of a film critic who finds himself trapped in a movie while screening. Will he be able to escape this horrific situation?
title: DD Next Level Now Streaming: Know Where to Watch This Tamil Horror-Comedy

description: The Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Aura Edition has a premium and sleek design language. The laptop features a 16-inch 2.8K IPS touch display that offers decent colour reproduction. It also features a powerful Intel Core Ultra 7 processor that can handle most of the daily tasks. Check out the review to learn more about the latest Lenovo laptop.
title: Lenovo Yoga Slim 7i Aura Edition Review: A Premium All-Rounder with a Few Rough Edges

description: Nothing Phone 3 is confirmed to launch in the US and now we have another reaffirmation of its debut in the country. It has been listed on the Walmart website, which suggests it could one of the channels through which it is sold. The handset will become the first Nothing-branded smartphone to be launched in the US.
title: Nothing Phone 3 Listed on Walmart Website, Reaffirming Its Launch in the US
